meanings.definition: The state or quality of being inadmissible.
meanings.sent1: The inadmissibilities of his argument made it impossible to consider.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer argued against the inadmissibilities of the evidence.
meanings.sent3: The inadmissibilities of the situation were so absurd that everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her inadmissibilities in the debate were like a wall blocking any progress.
meanings.sent5: The inadmissibilities of the case were as clear as day, leaving no room for doubt.

meanings.definition: The fact or condition of not being allowed or accepted.
meanings.sent1: The teacher explained the inadmissibilities of late submissions.
meanings.sent2: The inadmissibilities of his behavior led to serious consequences.
meanings.sent3: The inadmissibilities of wearing pajamas to a formal event were evident to all.
meanings.sent4: The inadmissibilities of his excuse were like a broken record, repeating the same old story.
meanings.sent5: The inadmissibilities of cheating on the test were crystal clear to the teacher.
